element.definition: Identifies the mutually agreed level of importance associated with reaching/sustaining the goal.
element.comments: Extensions are available to track priorities as established by each participant (i.e. Priority from the patient's perspective, different practitioners' perspectives, family member's perspectives)  The ordinal extension on Coding can be used to convey a numerically comparable ranking to priority.  (Keep in mind that different coding systems may use a "low value=important".
element.requirements: Used for sorting and presenting goals.

binding.description: The level of importance associated with a goal
